title: Cursed Souls
description:
Broken hearts are hard to mend, but what about shattered souls? 

Alana certainly hadn’t put matching tattoos, samurai swords, and falling for her mortal enemy on her bucket list. But now that she faces losing a man she might have broken beyond repair, there’s no time to waste. She’s willing to sacrifice everything to undo her mistake and earn back his trust.Plagued with strange dreams full of bloody feathers, she struggles to resist the angel's heavenly thrall, but her newest and most insidious adversary isn't the only one on the hunt. There’s a bounty on her head, enemies are piling up, and secrets after secrets come to light.
Will the darkness within her prove to be her saving grace? Or will it her undoing?


The Bloody Hearts trilogy ends in May.
author: Anya J. Cosgrove
